Convenient
web-based console

Without complicated installation and setup procedures, AI service can be instanly used if the internet connection is available Regardless of time and place, feel free to make use of the AI service for imaging devices based on HTML5-enabled web browsers such as Google Chorme, Microsoft Edge, and Naver Whales.

No extra cost,
all for one fixed monthly fee

If you have a credit card, a variety of AI services can be used at low cost. Subscribe to the best suited products for your business style, and find the most optimized billing options, such as a pay-as-you-go system that pays only for what you use, or a flat-rate monthly subscription
